hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Does the man who lifts his head ahead of the Imam (from prostration) not fear that Allah may change his head into the head of an ass?

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ سَبْقِ الإِمَامِ، بِرُكُوعٍ أَوْ سُجُودٍ وَنَحْوِهِمَا
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Preceding The Imam While Bowing, Prostrating And So On
